remarks: Equality of a class variable and a class abstraction.  In this version, the fact that ` x ` is a non-free variable in ` A ` is explicitely stated as a hypothesis.  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 11-May-2017.)
statement:
abeq2f.0 $e |- F/_ x A $.
abeq2f $p |- ( A = { x | ph } <-> A. x ( x e. A <-> ph ) ) $.
